subject: AI & Agents
title: Data Versioning with DVC
description: Learn Data Versioning with DVC in one minute.

hook.text: Git tracks code changes. But who tracks which dataset trained which model version?

buildup.text: Data Version Control (DVC) adds Git-like versioning for datasets and ML pipelines.

discovery.text: DVC stores lightweight pointers in Git while large files live in remote storage (S3, GCS).

twist.text: Without data versioning, reproducing a model from 3 months ago is nearly impossible.

climax.text: Pin every experiment to a data version. Reproducibility becomes a command, not a prayer.

punchline.text: Version your data like you version your code.

quiz.question: What problem does DVC solve?
options: Versioning large datasets alongside code in Git
